alert.note: Alert for Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 8:04AM EST until December 12 at 5:18PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at North Sidney. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 20.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
